document.full_text: daniel h. mudd, now the head of the fortress investment group, received a wells notice indicating that the s.e.c. is considering an enforcement action against him.
document.title: ex-fannie mae chief may face s.e.c. charges
lines_and_colors: daniel h. mudd, now the head of the fortress investment group, received a wells notice indicating that the s.e.c. is considering an enforcement action against him.
